Key Features.Intelligent Conversations: Engage with Anthropic's Claude LLMs for natural, context-aware discussions
Key Features.Visual Creation Studio: Generate and edit images through Stability AI with intelligent LLM assistance (tool use)
Key Features.Semantic Search: Find what you need with vector-based search that understands context, not just keywords
Key Features.Real-time Processing: Interactions with asynchronous processing and WebSockets that delivers generated content when created

Interface.Central Chat Area: Your AI interactions with tool use
Interface.Context Panel: Featuring a scrollspy for easy navigation and related chats powered by nearest neighbor vector matching

screenshots.caption: Offload image prompting and options to AI
Use presets to prime the LLM for specific tasks
Quickly view previous chats related to the current one
